channel.title: Version 5.22 :: Hugo Relearn Theme
channel.description: 5.22.1 (2023-10-02) Enhancements [feature] i18n: add Swahili translation #666 [feature] math: hide unrendered math #663 [feature] tabs: improve a11y by removing duplicate hidden title #662 [feature] mermaid: improve zoom UX #659 Fixes [bug] variant: fix sidebar-flyout borders color for zen #667 [bug] clipboard: fix RTL location of tooltip #661 [bug] clipboard: ignore RTL for code #660 [bug] expand: fix aria-controls #658 [bug] theme: fix id generation for markdownified titles #657 [bug] mermaid: avoid graph bombing on hugo â€“minify #656 [bug] mermaid: fix width for some graphs #655
